Which type of software runs the computer hardware itself and serves as the base layer?
Who is recognized as the 'Father of the Computer'?
Who was the first programmer, known for writing an algorithm for the Analytical Engine?
Which technology was the defining characteristic of First Generation computers (1940-56)?
What was the first commercial computer delivered to a business client?

What is the fastest and most powerful type of computer in the world, used for weather forecasting?
According to the module, what is a primary limitation of a computer?
options: It has no I.Q. and cannot think on its own
It cannot store large amounts of data
questions.correct: It has no I.Q. and cannot think on its own

questions.question: In the IPOS cycle, what is the 'intangible' output displayed on a screen called?
The ability of a computer to perform different tasks, like playing music and then solving math, is called:
Which future computing trend involves everyday objects like smart fridges being connected to the internet?
Which architecture, established in 1945, serves as the foundation for almost all modern computer systems?
Which component is described as the 'central hub' that allows all other hardware components to communicate?
The CPU consists of two primary logic units. What is the role of the Control Unit (CU)?
options: Regulating voltage from the wall outlet

questions.question: In the context of 2026 performance standards, what is considered a flagship high-end CPU clock speed?
What does it mean for RAM to be 'volatile' memory?
options: It is prone to physical damage
Data is lost when power is removed
It can be read but never written to
It is stored on a mechanical spinning disk
questions.correct: Data is lost when power is removed

questions.question: Which feature is a technical distinction of the DDR5 RAM standard compared to DDR4?
What is the primary function of the CMOS battery on a motherboard?
options: To provide emergency power for the CPU
To maintain system time and BIOS settings
To recharge the laptop's main battery
To act as a secondary storage device
questions.correct: To maintain system time and BIOS settings

questions.question: Which part of the System Bus is responsible for specifying the memory location where data should be sent?
Integrated Graphics (iGPU) differ from Dedicated Graphics (dGPU) because they:
options: Have their own independent cooling system
Are separate physical cards in PCIe slots
Share system RAM for video tasks
Are significantly faster for high-end gaming
questions.correct: Share system RAM for video tasks

questions.question: A Power Supply Unit (PSU) with an '80 Plus Gold' rating indicates its level of:
Which of the following is categorized as an 'Optical' input device in the slides?
What is the primary advantage of OLED monitor technology over standard LED-backlit LCDs?
options: Higher peak brightness in all conditions

questions.question: According to the 2026 resolution trends, what are the dimensions for a 4K (Ultra HD) display?
Which 2026 connectivity standard provides speeds up to 120 Gbps using a USB Type-C connector?
What is 'Thermal Throttling' in a computer system?
options: Hardware slowing itself down to reduce heat
A software utility for monitoring temperature
questions.correct: Hardware slowing itself down to reduce heat

questions.question: An Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) is superior to a basic surge protector because it provides:
options: Extra USB ports for peripheral charging
Emergency battery power for safe shutdowns
Faster internet speeds via line conditioning
questions.correct: Emergency battery power for safe shutdowns

questions.question: In the Fetch-Decode-Execute-Store cycle, what happens during the 'Decode' stage?
options: The CPU retrieves data from RAM
The Control Unit interprets the instruction
The ALU performs the math calculation
The result is written back to a register
questions.correct: The Control Unit interprets the instruction

questions.question: What is the primary function of a modern Neural Processing Unit (NPU)?
options: Accelerating local AI and LLM tasks efficiently
Increasing the storage capacity of the SSD
questions.correct: Accelerating local AI and LLM tasks efficiently

questions.question: According to the maintenance slide, how often should thermal paste typically be replaced?
options: Only if the CPU is upgraded
